info.name: TriTacTix
info.attribution:
The game layout, tile design, and library image are by LawDawg and released to the public domain as CC0.

The background image by Martin Stokow is CC0: https://publicdomainpictures.net/en/view-image.php?image=370218&picture=grunge-background-texture-marble.
info.description: Get rid of your triangle tiles by playing numbers that match on each side.
info.helpText:
Players sit in seats.

Add tiles to hand by pressing the numbered + buttons on the bottom left.

Manually calculate score.

Recall tiles for next hand by pressing the recall button (below the circular reset button on the bottom right).

fields.text: Do you want to reset the game, including the scores?
Do you want to recall all dominoes?

clickRoutine: // This is only needed once when the tiles are created in order to set the values the tile uses for the corners and colors.
